core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix disparate disciplines.
Emotion First: Every decision maps to a feeling.
Contrast: Light vs Dark, Rough vs Smooth.

typography.installation_instructions: Add the following to public/index.html: <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@300;400;500;600&family=JetBrains+Mono:wght@400;500&family=Space+Grotesk:wght@300;500;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">

usage.h1: font-heading text-5xl md:text-7xl font-bold tracking-tight leading-none
usage.label: font-mono text-xs uppercase tracking-widest text-primary

structure.content: Mission driven headline. 'Paradigm Shift' in AI.
structure.layout: Split left-right or Centered with massive typography.
Gridcols-2. Bold typography on left, detailed text on right.

structure.content: AI Stack (OpenAI, Anthropic), Modalities (Text, Vision), Dev Stack (Next.js, Tailwind).
structure.component: Card grid or Marquee of icons.
Shadcn Card or Accordion list. Each item has 'Apply' button.

structure.content: Simple, clear title. 'Plans that grow with you'. Toggle: Monthly/Yearly.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Update tailwind.config.js to extend colors with the new palette (keep existing but add branding).
2. Add the font link to public/index.html.
5. Ensure the background of the entire app (or these pages) is strictly #0f0f10.
6. Use the 'Glassmorphism' visual enhancer for cards to make them pop against the dark background.
7. For the Pricing Table, ensure it is mobile responsive (scrollable x-axis).
8. Use 'data-testid' on all buttons and inputs.
9. DO NOT use gradients for the main background. Use the solid #0f0f10.
10. Replace 'Inter' generic usage with 'Space Grotesk' for Headings <h1>, <h2>, <h3>.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: You tend to converge toward generic, 'on distribution' outputs. Avoid this.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; }.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  for icons. Use Lucide React icons.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays: separates good from extraordinary.
